title: Ranked Team.
body: My name is Apex661 im currently a bronze 4. I was Diamond 5 last season. My ranked team iMoRTaL is recruiting main adc and main support. Please give me friend request. We will test you out on norms.

replies.body:
Name: CensoredOtaku (http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=censoredotaku) 
Rank: Wood 2
Supports Played: Soraka (silver), Sona (silver), Thresh (silver), Blitzcrank (silver), Heimerdinger (gold), Janna (wood)

Won 5 VG tourneys with Heimer support.

Also:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=irC2BUsUFXQ&t=105

my name is ultrashenron in game i will add you and try out i can both adc or support. I have alarge champ pool and am very serious about the game and train hard. I am currently stuck in bronze tho because of trolls or afks.
